snippet: At the heart of an investigation around David H. Petraeus is Jill Kelley, who was a kind of social liaison between the military and civilian elite.
abstract: Tampa, Fla, socialite Jill Kelley is at the heart of an unfolding scandal that has cost  Central Intelligence Agency director David H Petraeus his job and ensnared Gen John R Allen as well; Kelley and her husband had carved out a niche for themselves as social hosts to powerful figures in the military, regularly hosting guests from MacDill Air Force Base, which is a driving force behind the Tampa economy.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG
byline.contributor: Michael S. Schmidt reported from Tampa, Fla., and Sheryl Gay Stolberg from Washington. Michael Wines contributed reporting from New York, and Matthew Rosenberg and Ron Nixon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: At the heart of an investigation around David H. Petraeus is Jill Kelley, who was a kind of social liaison between the military and civilian elite.

headline.seo: Tampa Social Scene at Center of Petraeus Scandal
headline.main: Tampa Is Seen as Social Link for Unfolding Scandal

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
